# Output a table

```{r exTable, echo = FALSE}
library(oldr)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

testSVY %>%
  create_op() %>%
  estimate_op(w = testPSU, indicators = "demo", replicates = 19) %>%
  select(LABEL:UCL.ALL) %>%
  kable()
```
